languageKey.label: Debugging
Debug: Choose debug settings. Debugging output can be directed to the controller's output (e.g. the frontend), to the Developer's Log (requires an extension like "devlog") or both.
None
To output
To Developer's Log
To both
Minimum level for debugging: Messages with a severity below the chosen limit will not be logged. This helps avoid clogging the output.
Success
Information
Notice
Warning
Error
Debug output class: Enter a class name to replace the default debugging output class. The class must be autoloaded and extend tx_displaycontroller_debugger.
No component of type %1$s and level %2$d found.
No provider defined.
No data filter found.
Incompatible structures between primary and secondary providers.
Primary Data Provider not found
Primary Data Filter not found
Secondary Data Provider not found
Error getting filter.
Primary provider set passStructure to false
Secondary provider set passStructure to false
Incompatible structures between primary provider and consumer.
Data Consumer not found
Primary filter
Secondary filter
Calculated filter structure
Display Controller Advanced (cached)
Create a fully-cached Display Controller Advanced.
Display Controller Advanced (not cached)
Create a non-cached Display Controller Advanced. This should be chosen only if needed, for example in case of a search function.
